question: Membuat kalimat positif present perfect dengan kata kerja forget​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have forgotten learn English for one week.

Penjelasan:

forgotten adalah irreguler verb dari forget.

Present perfect tense

didefinisikan sebagai suatu bentuk kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menyatakan suatu aksi atau situasi yang telah dimulai di masa lalu dan masih berlanjut sampai sekarang atau telah selesai pada suatu titik waktu tertentu di masa lalu namun efeknya masih berlanjut.

Rumus Present Perfect Tense :

Subject + has/have + verb 3

related_questions.question: What do you think about social media for the student

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

What do you think about social media for the students?

I think social media can be good or bad for students. Social media is good for students if they are able to filter bad information for their benefits. But, social media is bad for students if they keep consuming hoax, hate speech and all those negative contents on social media. The choice is yours!

Penjelasan:

Aku berpendapat bahwa media sosial bisa baik atau buruk bagi para siswa. Media sosial baik untuk para siswa jika mereka mampu menyaring informasi buruk demi keuntungan mereka. Tetapi, media sosial buruk bagi para pelajar jika mereka terus mengkonsumsi hoax, ujaran kebencian dan semua konten negatif di media sosial. Pilihan ada padamu!

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s
